channel.title: Racecar on YUJIE HE
channel.description: Recent content in Racecar on YUJIE HE

item.title: DIAN Racing Formula Student Electric Team
item.description:
Powertrain Group Leader from Sep. 2016 - Dec. 2018

  • Designed and optimized the overall powertrain system, including motor invertor, high-voltage accumulators, wheel-side planetary gearbox, and matching cooling system, to ensure China’s first leading four-wheel-drive Formula Student Racecar, with an 8% efficiency, 10% lightweight, and higher stability improvement
  • Participated FSEC 2016 - 2018 and SFJ 2018 as a senior engineer, DIAN Racing won first place in Engineering Design and Efficiency Prize, and Best Powertrain Award for two consecutive years.

The following video is virtual assembly of DRe18，which was what I worked for as Powertrain Group Leader.

Design Report Final @ FSEC19
